Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VkImageCopy2KHR

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkImageCopy2
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkImageCopy2KHR
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class VkImageCopy2KHR extends VkImageCopy2
See VkImageCopy2.

Layout


 struct VkImageCopy2KHR {
     VkStructureType sType;
     void const * pNext;
     VkImageSubresourceLayers srcSubresource;
     VkOffset3D srcOffset;
     VkImageSubresourceLayers dstSubresource;
     VkOffset3D dstOffset;
     VkExtent3D extent;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • VkImageCopy2KHR

      public VkImageCopy2KHR(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a VkImageCopy2KHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
